Package main

Class PurchasableManager

java.lang.Object
main.PurchasableManager
public class PurchasableManager extends Object
The PurchasableManager class is responsible for managing athletes and items that can be purchased. It provides methods to add, remove, and retrieve athletes and items.

  • Constructor Summary

    • getRandAthlete

      public Athlete getRandAthlete()
      Retrieves a random athlete from the list of available athletes. The retrieved athlete is removed from the list.
      Returns:
      the random athlete

    • getItem

      public Item getItem(int id)
      Retrieves an item from the list of available items.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the item to retrieve
      Returns:
      the retrieved item

    • getAllAthletes

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getAllAthletes()
      Retrieves all the available athletes.
      Returns:
      the list of all available athletes

    • getSomeAthletes

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getSomeAthletes(int number)
      Retrieves a specified number of available athletes. If the requested number is greater than the available athletes, all available athletes are returned.
      Parameters:
      number - the number of athletes to retrieve
      Returns:
      the list of retrieved athletes

    • getAllItems

      public ArrayList<Item> getAllItems()
      Retrieves all the available items.
      Returns:
      the list of all available items

    • remove

      public void remove(Athlete person)
      Removes an athlete from the list of available athletes.
      Parameters:
      person - the athlete to remove

    • remove

      public void remove(Item object)
      Removes an item from the list of available items.

    • minimumContractPrice

      public int minimumContractPrice()
      Retrieves the minimum contract price among the available athletes.
      Returns:
      the minimum contract price
